name: Blueberry Banana Pancakes 🥗
description: Start your day off right with these amazing pancakes! Packed with fresh blueberries and sweet bananas, these pancakes are a breakfast dream come true.
instructions: In a large bowl, mash the bananas until they reach a liquid state.
Heat butter or oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Pour batter into the warm skillet to cook. Garnish with desired number of blueberries. After about a minute and a half (or until golden) flip to finish cooking.
Allow to cool for a minute. Serve warm.
